metadata.Title: CVE-2019-15585 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Improper authentication exists in < 12.3.2, < 12.2.6, and < 12.1.12 for GitLab Community Edition (CE) and Enterprise Edition (EE) in the GitLab SAML integration had a validation issue that permitted an attacker to takeover another user's account.

notes.Note: msalvatore> Affects GitLab CE/EE 7.12 and later.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
